items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t come to terms with what had happened.
What have you bought your girlfriend for Christmas?
Without Tom\'s help, Mary couldn\'t have done that.
You\'re still too young to get a driver\'s license.
Tom didn\'t have to eat that if he didn\'t want to.
Tom is a picky eater and seldom tries anything new.
Tom is one of the best players we have on the team.
Tom is studying hard so that he can pass the exams.
Tom was in a fight last night and lost a few teeth.
Tom didn\'t think he\'d ever get used to Thai food.
Tom begged Mary not to say anything to his parents.
Tom encouraged Mary to write about her experiences.
Tom used to write articles for the local newspaper.
Have you already decided where you\'re going to go?
There was a large audience at yesterday\'s concert.
I don\'t think Tom understands what you\'re saying.
Tom will be eating dinner at Mary\'s house tonight.
Are you seriously thinking about getting a divorce?
Are you seriously thinking about quitting your job?
Carbon monoxide poisoning can cause hallucinations.
